attributes.action: place his cards on the table regarding his choice between Man Utd and Chelsea in this year's Premiership run in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hear the views of overpaid pundits on TV, and in the press, even from our ill-educated family members, friends and partners on this matter. Until I hear from the PM, I will not be placing my hard earned in the hands of my local bookmaker

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
